io.froilanandfriends.atm

Class LoginMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.froilanandfriends.atm.LoginMenu

  • public class LoginMenu
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles interaction with the user during the login phase.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LoginMenu

        public LoginMenu()

    • Method Detail

      • loginMenu

        public static void loginMenu()
        Prompts the user to login or create a new profile. If login, calls promptCredentials(), if create, calls createProfile().

      • promptCredentials

        public static void promptCredentials()
        Asks the user for their username and pin number, and calls Authenticator for verification. If authentication fails, returns to loginMenu().

      • createProfile

        public static void createProfile()
        Asks user for their account properties (first name, last name, security question, and email). Creates user from input, sets current user to created user, then calls userMenu().

      • findIllegalCharacters

        public static boolean findIllegalCharacters(java.lang.String stringToEdit)
        Helper method to determine whether input string contains non-word characters or spaces.

      • validateEmail

        public static boolean validateEmail(java.lang.String email)
        Helper method to determine whether a string is a valid email format (xxx@xxx.xxx).

      • promptUserName

        public static java.lang.String promptUserName()
        Prompts the user to enter a username and validates that it is not already taken and does not contain any non-word characters.
        Returns:
        The username submitted by the user, if validated.

      • promptPin

        public static int promptPin()
        Prompts the user to enter a PIN number, and validates that it consists of four digits only.
        Returns:
        The PIN number submitted by the user, if validated.

      • promptFirstName

        public static java.lang.String promptFirstName()
        Prompts the user to enter a first name and validates that it does not contain any non-word characters.
        Returns:
        The first name submitted by the user, if validated.

      • promptLastName

        public static java.lang.String promptLastName()
        Prompts the user to enter a last name and validates that it does not contain any non-word characters.
        Returns:
        The last name submitted by the user, if validated.

      • promptEmail

        public static java.lang.String promptEmail()
        Prompts the user to enter an email address and validates that it is in a valid format (xxx@xxx.xxx).
        Returns:
        The email address submitted by the user, if validated.

      • promptSecQuestion

        public static java.lang.String promptSecQuestion()
        Prompts the user to choose a security question and submit an answer, and validates that it does not contain any non-word characters.
        Returns:
        The security answer submitted by the user, if validated.

      • promptSecAnswer

        public static java.lang.String promptSecAnswer()
